message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9000 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10000 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
